item.title: Setup user autostart and properly configure systemd in Arch Linux
item.description: Create user: useradd -m -s /bin/bash username Create example service, like node app: nano ~/.config/systemd/user/app.service containing: [Unit] Description=One of the servers [Service] ExecStart=/usr/bin/node /home/username/server.js [Install] WantedBy=default.target From root run: loginctl enable-linger username and from user add: DBUS_SESSION_BUS_ADDRESS=unix:path=/run/user/$UID/bus to /home/username/.bashrc Then user can run: systemctl --user enable app.service enable/disable/start/stop/status
